text: Mola di Bari, commonly referred to simply as Mola (Barese: ), is a town and comune of the Metropolitan City of Bari, in the region of Apulia, in Southern Italy, on the Adriatic Sea. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Mola di Bari from Satellite (Google Local) * Article on the Mola di Bari community in the USA "The Other Mola", Tiziano Thomas Dossena, L'Idea.N.33, 2008 Category:Towns in Bari
title: Mola di Bari
